title: 12g Everyday Inverted
preparation_steps: Set AeroPress in Inverted position (plunger on table, chamber open side up).
Place filter in cap and rinse.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Start timer. Pour 200 grams of water rapidly to ensure all grounds are saturated. Give it 3 gentle stirs to break up any dry clumps.
Screw the filter cap on tightly. Now, squeeze the excess air out if you like, and let it steep until the timer hits 2 minutes. This immersion time gives full body.
At 2 minutes, carefully flip the AeroPress onto your mug. Press down gently and steadily for about 30 seconds. Stop at the hiss.

what_to_expect.description: A reliable daily driver using the inverted method to prevent any premature dripping. The 12g dose with a standard 1:16 ratio provides a balanced cup with medium body and clear flavor notes. Ideal for medium roast coffees.
what_to_expect.audio_script: This recipe is a perfect daily driver. By using the inverted position, we prevent any coffee from dripping through early, ensuring total control over the immersion time. The result is a consistent, balanced cup that highlights the best of your beans.

notes: Ensure cap is tight before flipping! Use a sturdy mug.
